input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Black Flowers Hard Snap On Case Cover Faceplate Protector for Samsung Hercules T989 Galaxy S2 T-Mobile

Product specifications:
Protect and personalize your phone with this Snap On Shield Hard Protector Case
Protects your phone from scratches, bumps, and dings
Very stylish, sleek, and easy to install
Has precise cut-outs to allow full access to all features the phone has to offer
Manufactured to fit
Requires no tools.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Protect and personalize your phone with this Snap On Shield Hard Protector Case. The case covers and protects your phone from dirt and bumps without adding a lot of bulk. Precise cut-outs provide easy access to all the phone's features, including the camera, charger port/dock connector, headset jack, and speaker. It requires no tools. Very stylish, sleek, and easy to install. It has openings precisely made for the sensors, charger, hands-free jack, and other buttons to allow full access to all the functions this phone has to offer. This hard case offers maximum protection and features a special coating that makes it slip-resistant, enabling you to have a better grip on your phone.
